page.title: 16DERELICT LAND
page.content: Six small zones only can be designated to this title.OVERROSS STREET:an area approx.55ydsx42yds, owned by the Town council. After 4 houses demolished it was once used by local garage,but now totally disused.BRAMPTON RD: privately owned area at entrance to Verschoyle House, bordering Oaklands, not used since planning refused for use as pub- lic house.CROFTS LANE:owned by retail furniture shop,but possibly on Town plan as new multi-storey car park or mall of shops.BROOKEND ST:privately owned,used for informal parking, but sometimes used for visiting showground Two properties in the area are dere- lict,but both would be worthy of rest- oration - in GREYTREE RD an old cott- age with evidence of wattle & daub con struction; on STATION ST an old engin- eering works, now lying empty although now owned by PGL Holidays.
